articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 1314
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 1314
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, inspected Unit of KPA 1314 honored with the Title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment.
					 Kim Jong Un went round the monument to the field guidance given by leader Kim Jong Il to the unit in December 2003.
					
					 After going round the unit, Kim Jong Un recalled that Kim Jong Il gave instructions for preparing soldiers to be fighters strong in idea and faith, rounding off the combat readiness and improving supply service. He stressed the need for the commanding officers and combatants to thoroughly implement the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Un went round the lecture room of O Jung Hup Political University.
					
					 After learning in detail about the education of O Jung Hup Political University, he underscored the necessity to give effective lectures as required by the mentality and characters of soldiers. To this end it is necessary to properly work out an education program, steadily improve the education contents and methods and ceaselessly raise the level of teachers and, at the same time, fully provide material and technical means for education, he said. He showed loving care for the unit.
					
					 There is nothing to fear when people remain strong in idea and the army is powerful, he noted, adding that the standoff with the enemy is the confrontation between arms and arms and between the idea and faith of the KPA and those of the enemy. He called for beating back the enemies armed to the teeth with the political and ideological superiority of the soldiers fully equipped with that idea and faith.
					
					 He looked round the mess hall and soy bean store of the unit.
					
					 He learnt about the combat duty, combat readiness and training of the unit at the military lecture room.
					
					 He set forth the tasks facing the unit which would serve as guidelines for rounding off its combat preparations and bolstering up its combat capability.
					
					 He gave service personnel a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and Army Col. General Ri Yong Gil, first vice-chief of the General Staff and director of the General Operational Bureau of the KPA.

articles.title: DPRK Newspapers Urge Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
DPRK Newspapers Urge Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Japanese imperialists poisoned Emperor Kojong of the Korean feudal government who had strong anti-Japan feelings on Jan. 22, 1919.
					 In this regard, newspapers of the DPRK carry articles on Sunday.
					
					 This thrice-cursed crime clearly shows that the Japanese imperialists are the sworn enemy of the Korean people and barbarous killer disregarding even international law, Rodong Sinmun in an article says, adding:
					
					 The reason behind Japan's plot to poison the Emperor was to dethrone him, cover up the truth behind the fabrication of the "Ulsa Five-point Treaty" and turn Korea into its complete colony. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists calculated that as long as the Emperor was left alive he would have adverse effects on their colonial rule over Korea.
					
					 So they hatched a plot to kill him. Afraid of the Korean people's and the international community's condemnation of them, they plotted to let the pro-Japanese lackeys execute their plan to dethrone the Emperor.
					
					 Against this backdrop, three special envoys of the Emperor including Ri Jun were present at the Second International Peace Conference in 1907, where they exposed the invalidity of the "Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty" and the Japanese imperialists' blatant encroachment on the Korean sovereignty.
					
					 The crafty Japanese aggressors shifted the blame for the Hague Special Envoy Incident onto the Emperor and illegally deposed him and killed him by poison.
					
					 Japan is not even feeling a sense of sin and responsibility for its crimes, far from repenting and apologizing for them. Instead it works desperately to pave a way for reinvasion, openly crying out for revival of militarism.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article says that the army and people of the DPRK will certainly force Japan to pay a dear price for its crimes, stressing that the Japanese imperialists who killed even the Emperor of Korea, not content with turning Korea into its colony in a brigandish way, are matchless barbarians.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Hit for Its Dependence on Outsiders and Confrontation Moves
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Hit for Its Dependence on Outsiders and Confrontation Moves
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet prime minister of south Korea who is styling himself "acting president", recently held a meeting with the ambassadors to China, Russia, the U.S., Japan and the UN under the pretext of taking steps to cope with the situation prevailing on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is nothing but a last-ditch effort to get rid of the unprecedented international isolation and humiliation caused by malicious sycophantic and treacherous deeds of traitor Park Geun Hye and press ahead with the "cooperation to put pressure on the north over its nuclear issue" with the foreign forces so as to attain the sinister ambition to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is paying dear for selling off the dignity and interests of the nation to foreign forces.
					
					 It is foolish enough to seek a way out of worsening crisis in dependence on foreign forces and the escalated confrontation with the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The meeting represents the last-gasp effort to overcome the diplomatic ordeals and at the same time maintain and intensify the "cooperation to pressurize the north over its nuclear issue" at any cost and thus stifle the compatriots with the help of their American and Japanese masters and neighboring powers.
					
					 Such foolish action will only incur the derision and condemnation at home and abroad.
					
					 Always miserable is the fate of the traitors to the nation prolonging their remaining days through dependence on foreign forces.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Judicature Comes under Fire for Taking Servile Attitude to Tycoon
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Judicature Comes under Fire for Taking Servile Attitude to Tycoon
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Tongil News said that the people's emergency action to remove the Park Geun Hye "government" and the Bar Association for Democratic Society held a news conference at the puppet Seoul Central District Court on Jan. 19, where they blasted the judicature for turning a blind eye to the corruption of the vice-chairman of the Samsung Electronics.
					 Speakers said it is intolerable that the court rejected to issue a warrant of arrest for the vice-chairman, who is the prime mover of the crime.
					
					 They said that they would closely watch the movement of the judicature.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Germany
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) --  The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany formed a preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, on January 17.
					 The chairman of the Forum was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set a celebration period from January 17 to February 16 and decided to hold seminar, book and photo exhibition, film show and other political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Birthdays of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Birthdays of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK formed a preparatory committee for celebrating the 105th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il on January 16.
					 The committee set a celebration period from January 16 to April 20 and decided to widely introduce the revolutionary careers and exploits of the great persons of Mt Paektu and hold seminars on exploits, film shows and other political and cultural events in the period.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Nigeria, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Nigeria, Ethiopia
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Briefings, reading sessions and roundtable talks on the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un took place in Nigeria and Ethiopia between January 3 and 9.
					 The permanent secretary of the Niger State government of Nigeria said:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address called for opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification by concerted effort of all Koreans this year marking the 45th anniversary of the historic July 4 joint statement and the 10th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 He stressed the need to take positive measures to improve the inter-Korean relations and remove the acute military conflict and war danger between the north and the south.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will make big stride in the struggle for national reunification under his wise guidance.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and other speakers expressed the full support for the proposals for Korea's reunification advanced by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					
					 The chairman of the Addis Ababa Youth Association of Ethiopia said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address gives great strength and courage to them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed in Uganda, Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Hailed in Uganda, Austria
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Personages of Uganda and Austria made public statements in support of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address on January 4 and 6.
					 The chairman of the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said:
					
					 In his New Year Address HE Kim Jong Un reviewed the great achievements made by the Korean people last year and set forth new tasks for bringing about rosier future under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism this year.
					
					 We, friends of the DPRK, could well know, through the New Year Address, about his noble intention to establish the revolutionary discipline of devotedly serving the people within the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 The UN sanctions against the DPRK and evermore growing military tension on the Korean peninsula cause serious concern of the peace-loving people of the world.
					
					 HE Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address declared the aboveboard stand on the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should drop its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 We call upon peoples of the countries desirous of independence to extend firm solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Heinrich Gruber, member of the leadership of the Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria, said that Korea's reunification is the most urgent, vital and greatest task for the Korean nation. It is the basic condition for Korea's reunification to prevent war danger and ensure peace and stability on the Korean peninsula, he noted.
					
					 He demanded that the U.S. and south Korea stop the dangerous war drills against the DPRK being staged every year.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Is a Proud and Grand Monument to Our Youth and a Symbol of Youth Power" was brought out in booklet at the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia.
					 The book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on January 10.

articles.title: Turkmenistan Parliamentary Speaker Supports DPRK's Stand on Reunification
articles.content:
Turkmen Parliamentary Speaker Supports DPRK's Stand on Reunification
Pyongyang, January 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Hyong Jun, DPRK ambassador to Turkmenistan, presented his credentials to the speaker of the Turkmen Parliament on January 17. 
					 On the occasion, the speaker said:
					
					 We are pleased that the policy of respecting and loving the people has been pursued and great achievements are being made in the economic construction and bolstering up defence capability in the DPRK under the leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un, and hope that everything will go well in the future, too.
					
					 The Turkmen government will strive to develop the bilateral relations with the DPRK in different fields. 
					
					 And it supports the DPRK's stand for protecting peace and security of the Korean peninsula and achieving its reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona la unidad 1314 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona la unidad 1314 del EPC
Pyongyang, 22 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la unidad 1314 del EPC galardonada con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					El paso revista al monumento a la visita de orientacion construido para transmitir las hazanas de guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il quien estuvo en la unidad en diciembre de 2003.
					
					Recordo que en aquella visita, el Dirigente dio instrucciones para preparar a los militares como los fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion, completar los preparativos de combate y mejorar las labores de intendencia. Anadio que los oficiales y combatientes deben materializar cabalmente los legados del Dirigente.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio la sala de leccion de la Universidad Politica O Jung Hup.
					
					Luego de averiguar en detalles el estado de educacion de la universidad, destaco la necesidad de impartir bien la leccion segun la psicologia y caracteristicas de los uniformados. Para ese fin, es preciso elaborar correctamente el programa de ensenanza, mejorar sin parar el contenido y metodos didacticos, elevar constantemente el nivel de los profesores y proveer de buenos medios materiales y tecnicos necesarios a la educacion, dijo y dispenso benevolencias para el cumplimiento de esas tareas.
					
					No tenemos nada que temer si contamos con la idea y el ejercito poderosos, asevero y prosiguio que el enfrentamiento con el enemigo es el de fuego y de la ideologia y conviccion.
					
					Por eso, debemos vencer a los enemigos armados hasta los dientes con la superioridad ideo-politica de punta a cabo de nuestros militares, enfatizo.
					
					Seguidamente, realizo un recorrido por el comedor y el deposito de soya de la unidad.
					
					En la sala de leccion militar, hizo conocimiento de la mision, los preparativos de movilizacion para el combate y el estado de entrenamiento de la unidad.
					
					Presento las tareas que serviran de guia en intensificar los preparativos de batalla y mejorar la combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Dejo como recuerdo a los combatientes el binoculo y el fusil automatico y se retrato con ellos.
					
					Le acompanaron en esta ocasion el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC, y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Ri Yong Gil, primer subjefe y director general de operaciones del Estado Mayor General del EPC.
